content:
/>
V.ii.3.A.1.h
.
Clarifying Issues and Claims
Whenever the disability claimed is not clearly identified, ensure that the claim clarification procedures outlined in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.D.1.c
have been followed and documented prior to issuing a rating decision.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Determining the Issues
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
